entity.description: Quarterly fiscal calendar of an organization. A span of time during which the financial activities of an organization are calculated.

attributes.name: userfiscalcalendarid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the quarterly fiscal calendar.

attributes.name: salespersonid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the associated salesperson.

attributes.name: fiscalperiodtype
attributes.description: Type of fiscal period used in the sales quota.

attributes.name: effectiveon
attributes.description: Date and time when the quarterly fiscal calendar sales quota takes effect.

attributes.name: quarter1
attributes.description: Sales quota for the first quarter in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: quarter2
attributes.description: Sales quota for the second quarter in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: quarter3
attributes.description: Sales quota for the third quarter in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: quarter4
attributes.description: Sales quota for the fourth quarter in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: createdby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the quarterly fiscal calendar.

attributes.name: createdon
attributes.description: Date and time when the quota for the quarterly fiscal calendar was created.

attributes.name: modifiedby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the quarterly fiscal calendar.

attributes.name: modifiedon
attributes.description: Date and time when the quarterly fiscal calendar was last modified.

attributes.name: timezoneruleversionnumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: transactioncurrencyid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the quarterly fiscal calendar.

attributes.name: utcconversiontimezonecode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: exchangerate
attributes.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the quarterly fiscal calendar with respect to the base currency.

attributes.name: quarter1_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the first quarter in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: quarter3_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the third quarter in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: quarter4_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the fourth quarter in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: quarter2_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the second quarter in the fiscal year

attributes.name: createdonbehalfby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the quarterlyfiscalcalendar.

attributes.name: modifiedonbehalfby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the quarterlyfiscalcalendar.
